    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3318</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Testing, Assessment and Evaluation , using a Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Prüfung, Einschätzung und Auswertung mit einem 
Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Test, évaluation et évaluation, en utilisant un
Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Testar, avaliação e avaliação, usando um 
Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova, stima e valutazione, usando un Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δοκιμή, αξιολόγηση και αξιολόγηση, που χρησιμοποιούν 
ένα Webquest</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Prueba, gravamen y evaluación, usando un 
Webquest</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">In this column,in the ETNI magazine RAG, there is a presetntation of how a webQuest is an alternative way of testing students' social and cognitive skills,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">assessment</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">evaluation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">In dieser Spalte im ETNI Zeitschrift LAPPEN, gibt
es ein presetntation von, wie ein webQuest eine alternative Methode 
der Prüfung der Sozial Kursteilnehmer und kognitive Fähigkeiten 
ist,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dans cette colonne, dans le CHIFFON de magazine 
d'ETNI, il y a un presetntation de la façon dont un webQuest est une 
voie alternative de tester les étudiants sociaux et les 
qualifications cognitives,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Nesta coluna, no PANO do compartimento de ETNI, 
há um presetntation de como um o mais webQuest é uma maneira 
alternativa de testar os estudantes sociais e habilidades cognitive,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In questa colonna, nel PANNO dello scomparto di 
ETNI, ci è un presetntation di come un più webQuest è un modo 
alternativo di verificare gli allievi sociali e le abilità 
conoscitive,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σε αυτήν την στήλη, στο ΚΟΥΡΈΛΙ περιοδικών ETNI, 
υπάρχει ένα presetntation για το πώς ένα webQuest είναι 
ένας εναλλακτικός τρόπος των κοινωνικών και γνωστικών δεξιοτήτων
των εξεταστικών σπουδαστών,</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">En esta columna, en el TRAPO del compartimiento 
de ETNI, hay un presetntation de cómo un la ma's webQuest es una 
manera alternativa de probar los estudiantes sociales y las 
habilidades cognoscitivas,</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einschätzung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Auswertung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">webquest</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
